articles.title: US Urges India's Probe Into Pannun Plot Proceed ‘Quickly and Transparently’ - The Wire
articles.description: US assistant secretary of state for South and Central Asia, Donald Lu, also said that the Biden administration took the Pannun plot allegations “incredibly seriously and have raised it at the highest levels with India”.
articles.content: New Delhi: The United States emphasised the need for an Indian high-level panel to quickly and transparently investigate allegations that agents of the Indian government orchestrated an assassination… [+4451 chars]
